string.value: |Shi no sabaku o koete kimashita! Soshite koko ni mo ningen no konseki ga nokotte imasu. Hito ga teijuu suru bashonara doko demo!
|Mazu, nenryoo o hokyuu shite shuuri shite moraeru shuuri koojoo o mitsukete kara, do usu ru ka kangaemasu.
|Kochira ga sekiyu chozoo shisetsu, buji toochaku shimashita. Sate, zenshin to toreeraa o tsumikonde modorimasu.
Omedetoo! Anata wa reesu ni kachimashita!
Anata wa jun yuushoo o te ni shita.
Anata wa 3 idatta.
Anata wa reesu ni makemashita.
Kuruma o kurasshu sa sete shimai, reesu o zokkoo dekinaku narimashita.
Machigatta sutaato! Anata wa makemasu.
|Watashi wa toreeraa-tsuki no kuruma o unten suru koto o nagaiai yumemite kimashita. Yumegakanau...
|Watashi no orijinaru torakku. Hontooni kare ga inakute sabishiidesu! Kono yokokuhen ni kanshite wa, mattaku motte, konomama de subete ni manzoku shite imasu.
ROOJIN|To iu koto de minato ni toochaku shimashita. Watashi o teki kara mamotte kurete arigatoo.
|Dooitashimashite. Hoka no tochi e no tabi mo ganbatte kudasai.
|Soshite Risa mo tsurete ikimashou. Soodenaito kanojo wa daijoobude wa arimasen.

ROOJIN|Saisho wa kono koto o iitakunakatta nodesuga, anata ga tazuneta hito wa jitsuwa watashitachi no mura ni ita nodesu. Kare wa sarani azuma e mukaimashita. Onegaidesu, kare ni wa shitagawanaide kudasai! Soko de matte iru no wa shi dakeda. Aruiwa shi yori mo osoroshii nani ka.
|Kuso! Nani ga kare o son'nani kowagara seta nodeshou ka? Kanzen ni shooki o ushinatte shimatta, kawaisoonahito… ima,-gai de nanto iou ka?
|Soshite, nantoka shite Kefu kara nukedasanakereba narimasen.
RISA|Nanika kibun ga yoku arimasen. Kono sabaku ni toochaku shita shunkan, watashi wa nandaka kimyoona kankaku o oboemashita.
|Tsuyoku natte kudasai! Sudeni mokuhyoo ni chikadzuite iru yoona ki ga shimasu!
RISA|Sore wa subete anata no seidesu! Anata wa watashi o koko ni hikizurikomimashita, soshite ima, anata wa watashi o kono imaimashii sakyuu no naka de shina seru tsumoridesu!
|[Kanojo wa ki ga kawatta yooda. Hitsuyoona no wa sore dakeda.] Kiite, Risa, daijoobu, ashi wa attakai yo. 10 Made kazoete ochitsuite kudasai.
RISA|Gomen'nasai... Nanika ga watashi ni okotte imasu... Jibun o seigyo shiyou to shimasu... Kono sabaku... Watashi ni sematte imasu...
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?
Kono michi ga doko ni tsudzuite iru no ka wakaranainode, koko ni tomarimasu.
Soko ni wa rikaidekinai nanika ga aru. Soko ni wa ikimasen.
Dooyara fune o yobu soochi ga koshoo shita yooda. Aruiwa, sanzoku ga minato ni aru subete no setsubi o nusunda no kamo shiremasen. Izure ni seyo, anata wa 4-ri de ikanakereba narimasen.
Buharuto-ka o sukuu koto wa dekinakatta. Korede wa kesshite mokuhyoo o tassei suru koto wa dekimasen.
Toreeraa wa hakai sa re, sekiyu no yusoo wa chuushi sa reru.
